greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} ((1 + 2*x^k) / (1 + x^k)).
comment: It appears that this sequence contains only finitely many nonpositive terms, namely at indices {2, 4, 8, 11, 13, 17, 19, 34}. - _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 23 2019
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Vaclav Kotesovec, Graph - The asymptotic ratio
formula: G.f.: Product_{k>=1} (1 - Sum_{j>=1} (-1)^j * x^(k*j)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 06 2019
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 06 2016
